_sText:
I was bored and wanted to see if i can do it, so i did... 

This is my first prefab, so it may have some bugs, i don't have a server to test it out on :(

I thought maybe someone could use it in a death run map, i keep hearing about them but have never played one.

well once player steps into the room the doors lock, one door that is meant to be the entrance has a window so anybody outside can watch the carnage lol, after player dies the doors open, the laser is only triggered once per round. so after the firs one through is done so is the laser.

I put some effort into this, so don't be to harsh guys ;)

Video of prefab in action:
